meanings.definition: A boatel is a floating hotel or lodging facility on a boat.
meanings.sent1: The boatels on the river offer a unique experience for travelers.
meanings.sent2: We stayed at one of the boatels during our vacation by the lake.
meanings.sent3: The boatels were so cozy that the guests didn't want to leave.
meanings.sent4: The boatels glided gracefully on the water, like floating islands of comfort.
meanings.sent5: The boatels rocked gently with the waves, lulling guests to sleep.

meanings.definition: Boatels can refer to a group of boats used for lodging purposes.
meanings.sent1: The boatels lined up along the shore, creating a picturesque sight.
meanings.sent2: We rented a few boatels for our family reunion on the lake.
meanings.sent3: The boatels seemed to gossip with each other as the night fell.
meanings.sent4: The boatels formed a protective circle around the bay, like a fleet of guardians.
meanings.sent5: The boatels twinkled with lights, beckoning weary travelers to rest.
